about_the_game:
Made possible through the combined experience of countless survival experts, this pack is chock full of necessities to help keep you alive.

Once downloaded, this item can be obtained via the in-game merchant and includes handgun ammo, shotgun ammo, a first aid med pack, and a lockpick. Only available once during each playthrough from New Game.

Sufficient inventory space for all of the included items is required when purchasing this pack in-game.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Resident Evil Village - Survival Resources Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance (when set to Prioritize Performance): 1080p/60fps. ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 required to support ray tracing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 required to support ray tracing.

short_description: Curated by a team of survival experts, this pack is full of necessities to help keep you alive. This item can be obtained via the in-game merchant and includes handgun ammo, shotgun ammo, a first aid med pack, and a lockpick. Only available once during each playthrough from New Game.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Thai
